00008 // specialisation for complex - there shall be no scaling - and we cannot compute minmax
00009 template<> scaling_pair ValuePtr<std::complex<float> >::getScalingTo( unsigned short /*typeID*/, autoscaleOption /*scaleopt*/ )const
00010 {
00011     return scaling_pair( util::Value<float>( 1 ), util::Value<float>( 0 ) );
00012 }

00026 // some voodoo to get the vector types into the templates /
00028 template<typename T> struct _VectorUnion {
00029     union {__m128i reg; T elem[16/sizeof( T )];} vec;
00030     _VectorUnion( const T *el ) {std::copy( el, el + 16 / sizeof( T ), vec.elem );}
00031     _VectorUnion( __m128i _reg ) {vec.reg = _reg;}
00032     _VectorUnion() {}
00033 };
00034 template<typename T> struct _TypeVector;
00035 
00036 // mapping for signed types
00037 #define DEF_VECTOR_SI(TYPE,KEY)                              \
00038     template<> struct _TypeVector<TYPE>{                         \
00039         static __m128i gt(__m128i a,__m128i b){return _mm_cmpgt_epi ## KEY (a, b);}                                                        \
00040         static __m128i lt(__m128i a,__m128i b){return _mm_cmplt_epi ## KEY (a, b);}                                                        \
00041     };
00042 DEF_VECTOR_SI( int8_t, 8 );
00043 DEF_VECTOR_SI( int16_t, 16 );
00044 DEF_VECTOR_SI( int32_t, 32 );
00045 
00046 // value offset to compare unsigned int as signed (there is no compare for unsigned in SSE2)
00047 template<typename T> __m128i _getAddV()
00048 {
00049     _VectorUnion<T> ret;
00050     const T filler = 1 << ( sizeof( T ) * 8 - 1 );
00051     std::fill( ret.vec.elem, ret.vec.elem + 16 / sizeof( T ), filler );
00052     return ret.vec.reg;
00053 }
00054 
00055 // mapping for unsigned types
00056 #define DEF_VECTOR_UI(TYPE,KEY)                                 \
00057     template<> struct _TypeVector<TYPE>{                            \
00058         static __m128i addv;                                        \
00059         static inline __m128i gt(__m128i a,__m128i b){return _mm_cmpgt_epi ## KEY (_mm_add_epi ## KEY(a,addv), _mm_add_epi ## KEY(b,addv));} \
00060         static inline __m128i lt(__m128i a,__m128i b){return _mm_cmplt_epi ## KEY (_mm_add_epi ## KEY(a,addv), _mm_add_epi ## KEY(b,addv));} \
00061     };\
00062     __m128i _TypeVector<TYPE>::addv=_getAddV<TYPE>();
00063 
00064 DEF_VECTOR_UI( uint8_t, 8 );
00065 DEF_VECTOR_UI( uint16_t, 16 );
00066 DEF_VECTOR_UI( uint32_t, 32 );
00067

00069 
00071 // optimized min/max function for integers /
00073 
00074 // generic fallback using cmpgt and some bitmask voodoo
00075 template<typename T> std::pair<__m128i, __m128i> _getMinMaxBlockLoop( const __m128i *data, size_t blocks )
00076 {
00077     std::pair<__m128i, __m128i> ret( _mm_loadu_si128( data ), _mm_loadu_si128( data ) );
00078     LOG( Runtime, verbose_info ) << "using optimized min/max computation for " << util::Value<T>::staticName() << " (masked mode)";
00079     static const __m128i one = _mm_set_epi16( 0xFFFF, 0xFFFF, 0xFFFF, 0xFFFF, 0xFFFF, 0xFFFF, 0xFFFF, 0xFFFF );
00080 
00081     while ( --blocks ) {
00082         const __m128i at = _mm_loadu_si128( ++data );
00083 
00084         const __m128i less_mask = _TypeVector<T>::lt( at, ret.first );
00085         const __m128i greater_mask = _TypeVector<T>::gt( at, ret.second );
00086 
00087         ret.first =
00088             ( ret.first & ( less_mask ^ one ) ) //remove bigger values from current min
00089             | ( at & less_mask ); //put in the lesser values from at
00090         ret.second =
00091             ( ret.second & ( greater_mask ^ one ) ) //remove lesser values from current max
00092             | ( at & greater_mask ); //put in the bigger values from at
00093     }
00094 
00095     return ret;
00096 }
00097 
00098 // specialiced versions using processor opcodes for min/max
00099 template<> std::pair<__m128i, __m128i> _getMinMaxBlockLoop<uint8_t>( const __m128i *data, size_t blocks ) //PMAXUB
00100 {
00101     std::pair<__m128i, __m128i> ret( _mm_loadu_si128( data ), _mm_loadu_si128( data ) );
00102     LOG( Runtime, verbose_info ) << "using optimized min/max computation for " << util::Value<uint8_t>::staticName() << " (direct mode)";
00103 
00104     while ( --blocks ) {
00105         const __m128i at = _mm_loadu_si128( ++data );
00106         ret.first = _mm_min_epu8( ret.first, at );
00107         ret.second = _mm_max_epu8( ret.second, at );
00108     }
00109 
00110     return ret;
00111 }
00112 template<> std::pair<__m128i, __m128i> _getMinMaxBlockLoop<int16_t>( const __m128i *data, size_t blocks ) //PMAXSW
00113 {
00114     std::pair<__m128i, __m128i> ret( _mm_loadu_si128( data ), _mm_loadu_si128( data ) );
00115     LOG( Runtime, verbose_info ) << "using optimized min/max computation for " << util::Value<int16_t>::staticName() << " (direct mode)";
00116 
00117     while ( --blocks ) {
00118         const __m128i at = _mm_loadu_si128( ++data );
00119         ret.first = _mm_min_epi16( ret.first, at );
00120         ret.second = _mm_max_epi16( ret.second, at );
00121     }
00122 
00123     return ret;
00124 }

00180 #endif
00181 
00182 template<typename T> std::pair<T, T> _getMinMax( const T *data, size_t len )
00183 {
00184     size_t blocks = len / ( 16 / sizeof( T ) );
00185 
00186     T bmin = std::numeric_limits<T>::max();
00187     T bmax = std::numeric_limits<T>::min();
00188 
00189     if( blocks ) { // if there are 16byte-blocks of values
00190         std::pair<__m128i, __m128i> minmax = _getMinMaxBlockLoop<T>( reinterpret_cast<const __m128i *>( data ), blocks );
00191         // compute the min/max of the blocks bmin/bmax
00192         const _VectorUnion<T> smin = minmax.first;
00193         const _VectorUnion<T> smax = minmax.second;
00194         bmin = *std::min_element( smin.vec.elem, smin.vec.elem + 16 / sizeof( T ) );
00195         bmax = *std::max_element( smax.vec.elem, smax.vec.elem + 16 / sizeof( T ) );
00196     }
00197 
00198     // if there are some remaining elements
00199     if( data + blocks * 16 / sizeof( T ) < data + len ) {
00200         const T rmin = *std::min_element( data + blocks * 16 / sizeof( T ), data + len );
00201         const T rmax = *std::max_element( data + blocks * 16 / sizeof( T ), data + len );
00202         return std::pair<T, T>( std::min( bmin, rmin ), std::max( bmax, rmax ) );
00203     } else {
00204         return std::pair<T, T>( bmin, bmax );
00205     }
00206 }
00207 
00209 // specialize calcMinMax for (u)int(8,16,32)_t /
00211 
00212 template<> std::pair< uint8_t,  uint8_t> calcMinMax( const  uint8_t *data, size_t len ) {return _getMinMax( data, len );}
00213 template<> std::pair<uint16_t, uint16_t> calcMinMax( const uint16_t *data, size_t len ) {return _getMinMax( data, len );}
00214 template<> std::pair<uint32_t, uint32_t> calcMinMax( const uint32_t *data, size_t len ) {return _getMinMax( data, len );}
